entities.name: moonstone
entities.description: Moonstone is mentioned as a subject of study, specifically its properties and uses in potion-making. It is described as being the topic of a 12-inch parchment that needs to be handed in on Thursday.

entities.name: potion
entities.description: Potions are mentioned as being made by students, including Harry, Ron, and Neville. They are described as having various consistencies and odors.

entities.name: flagon
entities.description: Flagons are mentioned as containers used to hold potions. They are described as being filled with potion and handed in to Snape's desk.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is mentioned as the teacher who receives the flagons from students. He is not described in detail, but his presence is noted as a significant part of the scene.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as a student who is upset about receiving zero marks for his potion. He is described as clearing away his things and slumping down onto his seat.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as a fellow student of Harry's who also made a potion that did not turn out well. His potion is described as giving off a foul odor.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is mentioned as another student who made a potion that did not turn out well. His potion is described as having the consistency of just-mixed cement.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as joining Harry and Ron for lunch after class. She is not described in detail, but her presence is noted as a significant part of the scene.

relationships.description: Harry made a potion that did not turn out well, resulting in him receiving zero marks for the day's work.
Ron also made a potion that did not turn out well, giving off a foul odor.
Neville made a potion that did not turn out well, having the consistency of just-mixed cement.
Harry will be receiving zero marks for the day's work from Snape.
